title: Still REALLY tired of seeing the same champions every match

replies.body:
I'm tired of seeing 
Yas
Lee
Graves

it's like out of 125+ champions, one of these 3 champions are almost guaranteed to be in a game. Their popularity is so high..
might just be me but I've been seeing a lot less yasuo's than these champs.

I see him literally almost every game.


He's usually the first ban

> I love seeing {{champion:104}}  in most of my matches.

Lol what are you talking about? He's in almost none of your matches 

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=DonnieDarkin+

At a quick glance, out of your last 10 games, he was in two of them. "most of my matches" lolk

0/10 circlejerk attempt

I dont play on this account. Respond to the thread for what it says, dont be a douche and try to make your argument based on the persons match history. On the accounts I play on he is in most of my matches. Until now since now I ban him whenever I can.

I feel like Top and Jungle for the longest while have been starved of diversity. 

Jungle is always Lee or Graves, ever so slightly will you see something else unless you ban one. 

Top is the same thing for the past year and half, Darius and Fiora pretty much your two OG picks unless banned. You'd find the occasional Riven, Renekton, Yasuo, Gangplank.

Tops meta right now is actually ridiculously good. Kled, Fizz, Fiora, Renekton, Pantheon, Tanks (Naut, Gragas, Poppy, Maokai - little less now), Camille are all GOOD right now if played properly.

Like legit the number of viable top laners has never been this big for a while lol. Nerfs to tanks and now shift to mobile ADCs (require less peel) and more shielding supports has put top in a really good spot meta-wise.

Jungle is in a sad spot meta wise though.

You forgot all the other mobile AD doushelords like Lee and Lucian and Yasuo and Fiora

Honorable mention to the mobile AP miscreant Ahri
I DO. News flash, you don't always get to ban.

It not necessarily meta sometimes... some champions are just really fun to play or really flexible so you can just 1 trick them and know that regardless of meta changes you're pretty much good to go. Orianna, Ahri and lee sin are perfect examples and they're playrates are all pretty high regardless of the meta.
And thats what we call a meta
